original_title: The Ridiculous Delay In The Appellate Court Review Of The Absurd Civil Judgment Against Donald Trump.  Weeks turned into months & then into years as the appellate court seems lost in navel-gazing. Now, WSJ reports that the Appellate Court Is Reportedly Split Over Trump Civil Judgement.   — The Donald
article_summary: Appellate Court Delays Trump's Civil Judgment Appeal Amid Judicial Divisions, Frustrating Observers. The delay is seen as a tactic when courts cannot rule against Trump, and the split in the court is attributed to partisan divisions and differing interpretations of the law.</s>
